sections.title: Expiry
items: Format a date as a colour coded time relative to the current browser time.

items: Format a list of items as a series of paragraphs.

sections.title: Paginated Items
items: The paginated items formatter reduces the number of items to the page size, calculates the number of pages, and provides a filter to search for a specific item. It can be used to create a filterable, multi-page view of large datasets using a custom renderer.

sections.title: Icon component
items: Display an SVG icon matching the inline font-size.
Search using the Icon Browser; then use <Icon icon="name"> where you want the icon to show up.
